data.title: List of American films of 1993
data.text:
This is a list of American films released in 1993.

Box office

[edit]

The highest-grossing American films released in 1993, by domestic box office gross revenue, are as follows:[1]

Highest-grossing films of 1993 Rank Title Distributor Domestic gross 1 Jurassic Park Universal $357,067,947 2 Mrs. Doubtfire 20th Century Fox $219,195,243 3 The Fugitive Warner Bros. $183,875,760 4 The Firm Paramount $158,348,367 5 Sleepless in Seattle TriStar Pictures $126,680,884 6 Indecent Proposal Paramount $106,614,059 7 In the Line of Fire Columbia $102,314,823 8 The Pelican Brief Warner Bros. $100,768,056 9 Schindler's List Universal $96,065,768 10 Cliffhanger TriStar Pictures $84,049,211
